text:
Message 230 of 4024
OFW is for kid related things...
With exceptions for kid related email and calls. And of course your added OFW rules on top of that. Just want to be transparent around what we were
and were not told to do for our coms.
“I have also attached email guidelines.  My role is the parenting side.  I know that there is a lot of communication regarding the divorce and property
that are separate from parenting.”
Sent:01/04/2024 at 11:22 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/04/2024 at 11:25 AM)
Subject:Dr Brown 12/16
Message 231 of 4024
Agree that was initial proposal. The communication outside OFW was intended to be limited and no physical contact or calls given the conflict
between us, and also limited to emergencies.
My experience was those texts and email escalated, filled with emotions and feelings that were inappropriate and at time that made me feel very
Sent:01/04/2024 at 11:32 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/04/2024 at 11:35 AM)
Subject:Re: Dr Brown 12/16
